Whether it is picking up cakes, parcels, gifts, wedding cards, or couriers, or taking your car / bike for servicing, or receiving guests from the airport/railway station, Franking Legal errand for Franking, Notarization, Affidavits. Registration errand for RTO Services, Certificates & licenses work from municipal, Ticket collection for favorite show etc. we offer it all. Even ChotuMotu stand in queue on behalf of you.

Please include us in your database

Bharat Innovation Fund is a $100M Series A Venture Fund creating the next phase of startup evolution in India focused on more Deep-Tech, B2B, IP and innovation based startups, beyond the current wave of consumer focused e-commerce, hyper-delivery and marketplace models. The Fund is built on the foundations of one of India's largest and the most successful Incubator/acceleration programs and successfully running two Seed Funds focused on B2B and IP focused sectors with demonstrable exits. The roots and affiliation of Bharat Innovation Fund goes back to Indian Institute of Management (IIM), Ahmedabad, India's premier B-School who ran one of India's largest incubator/acceleration program (ciie.co) for the last 10 years. The mission of the Fund is to invest in IP-driven Indian startups creating Breakthrough in Healthcare, Agriculture, Renewables and Advanced Technologies including in AI/ML, IoT, Security etc.

Apr-12-2020	Dhananjay Baweja	CEO	Bangalore	dhananjay.baweja@gmail.com	India	9617803184	FLY-OH	PE/VC Investor			Dear Investor,

I and my team are working on a platform to provide housekeeping services on subscription bases. Our plan is to provide maids, cooks, cloth washing and drivers on a subscription model. People can choose services and subscribe to those on Daily, weekly, monthly, half-yearly or yearly bases.

We will also manage the service provider. We will be providing a replacement for a provider if not available and we will also make sure that there is consistency in delivery services. Later we will be able to give a combo of all the equipment and chemicals which will be required.

Our basic plan is to bring India's unorganized sector and give some structure to it. To get proper structure we will use all the advance learning of AI and ML. We will track all the performance of user and service providers. Which will give us a better understanding of what customer needs and how to improve it.

We can also understand the basic customer behaviour by what they spend on and what kind of services they opt for. That can be later used to do marketing for another company. 

We are looking forward to investments so that we can kick-start our operations as soon as covid-19 settles in India.

If we can talk about business in detail it will be great. Looking forward to your response.
